author: vaesgoth
title: Boost impact projects with Catalyst
description:
Environmental & social challenges are increasingly crucial.
However, impact projects lack funding and appropriate support to succeed.
solution: Score, mentor, tokenize and accelerate Catalyst Environmental & Social Projects while turning them into financially viable investments.
experience: Team of blockchain experts (10+ successful ICOs, IOHK strategic partners) and skilled entrepreneurs (Y Combinator Alumni, acquisitions).
